mapper.sql: v_village_id , v_village_name, v_address, v_project_id, v_remarks, dt_create_time, dt_modify_time, v_create_user_id, v_modify_user_id, i_del_flag
mapper.select:
select village.v_village_id, village.v_village_name from tbl_village village inner join tbl_elevator ele on ele.v_village_id = village.v_village_id
join tbl_sys_user_resource resource on ele.v_elevator_id = resource.v_resource_id and v_user_id = #{userId}
and village.v_village_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{villageName},'%')
group by village.v_village_id
